```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: false
file_name <- here::here("data","google-photos.rds")
ggl_photos <- readRDS(file=file_name)
img_folder <- "img"

slc <- filter_ggl_photo(ggl_photos, description = "Maracaibo", 
  album_name = "Lugares - Sur América", nfotos = 1)
```

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: false
#| output: asis
htmlcode <- "<center>\n<img src='%s/%s-%s.jpg'>\n<br/>\n
<strong>%s</strong>  por <a href='%s' target='googlephotos'>JR Ferrer-Paris @ Google Photos</a><br/>
</center>"

show_photo <- photos %>% 
    slice(slc) %>%
    transmute(code = sprintf(htmlcode, img_folder, 
    output_id, output_file, mediaItems.description, mediaItems.productUrl)) %>% pull()
cat(show_photo)
```

## Imágenes de Maracaibo

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: false

paths <- sprintf("%s/%s-%s.jpg",
  img_folder, 
  pull(photos[-slc,],output_id),
  pull(photos[-slc,],output_file)
  )
captions <- photos %>%
  slice(-slc) %>% 
  transmute(caption=sprintf("<strong>%s</strong>  por <a href='%s' target='googlephotos'>JR Ferrer-Paris @ Google Photos</a>",mediaItems.description,mediaItems.productUrl)) %>% 
  pull

pixgallery(paths, caption=captions)

```
```{r}
#| echo: false
paths <- sprintf("http://i.imgur.com/%s.jpg?1",
c("BO7Hzhx", "jFlMDBE"))
captions <- sprintf("Imágen por <a href='https://i.imgur.com/%s.jpg' target='imgur'>NeoMapas @ imgur</a>",  c("BO7Hzhx", "jFlMDBE"))
pixgallery(paths, caption=captions)
```

## Observaciones en `iNaturalist`


```{r}
file_name <- here::here("data","iNaturalist-obs-NeoMapas.rds")
inat_photos <- readRDS(file=file_name) 
seleccion <- "Maracaibo"
```

```{r}
paths <- inat_photos %>% 
    filter(grepl(seleccion,place_guess)) %>% 
    pull(image_url)
captions <- inat_photos %>% 
    filter(grepl(seleccion,place_guess)) %>% 
    transmute(caption=sprintf("<strong>%s</strong> (<emph>%s</emph>) by <a href='%s' target='iNat'>NeoMapas @ iNaturalist</a>",species_guess,scientific_name,url)) %>% pull()

pixgallery(paths, caption=captions)
```
